title: I can’t attempt more than 120 questions in the NEET mock test. Why is it so? What can I do to increase my number of attempts? - Quora

response.answer_text: it can be due to only one reason Time management for that Use timer & practice mcqWhile attempting mock paper, start by answering the ones that take less than a minute to solve. Doing this, you have extra time on hand for those that will take more than a minute to solve. simple tip stay calm all the best

Time management is the other name of NEET , I would say You must be lacking the question practice… Do solve numericals within time limits , set a stopwatch or timer , & observe how much time do you take for 1 numerical.. Start your Attempts in mock paper with the question you are sure to answer or on which you have confidence.. Dont waste your time on those question which are out of your reach… My paper attempting sequence was like — Bio then chemistry then chemistry(numericals), then physics (non numericals) & at last physics(numericals)
